name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy URL Buttons in Google Search Results

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes copying links from google search results faster by adding 1-click copy buttons next to the results

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Right-clicking on links to copy their URLs from Google search results could get tiring if you frequently keep sharing/pasting the links with others. This extension makes it easy.
